description: He helped revolutionise fashion with his futuristic and stylish designs in the 1950s and 60s.
title: Pierre Cardin: French fashion giant dies aged 98
title_page: Pierre Cardin: French fashion giant dies aged 98 - BBC News
maintext: After the news was announced, his official Instagram account posted one of his quotes: "I have always worked in my own style, which is different from all others. It was always my intention to be different, because that is the only way to last."
